item.title: Ensemble Learning with Gradient Boosting
item.description: body { text-align: justify} Ensemble often have lower error than any individual method by themselves. It has also less overfitting leading us to a better performance in the test set. Each kind of learners that we might use has a sort of bias. Combining all of them, can reduce this bias. Gradient Boost vs.Â AdaBoost Gradient Boost is similar with AdaBoost that starts by building a very short tree called stump from the training data.
